parameters.name: permset_d
parameters.description: The permissions set that you want to modify.

parameters.name: perm
parameters.description:
The permission that you want to add; one of the following:

  
ACL_EXECUTE

ACL_READ

ACL_WRITE

full_content:
Function: acl_add_perm
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/acl_add_perm.html
Synopsis: int acl_add_perm( acl_permset_t permset_d,
Headers: #include <sys/acl.h>
Parameters:
  - permset_d: The permissions set that you want to modify.
  - perm: The permission that you want to add; one of the following:

  
ACL_EXECUTE

ACL_READ

ACL_WRITE
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <sys/acl.h>

int acl_add_perm( acl_permset_t permset_d,
                  acl_perm_t perm );
